channel.title: We Used to be Fun...
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast about our family of four where we discuss parenting, life events, argue about stuff, and hear from our adorable children.
channel.itunes:author: Levi and Amy
channel.itunes:summary: A podcast about our family of four where we discuss parenting, life events, argue about stuff, and hear from our adorable children.

item.title: We're back!
item.itunes:title: We're back!
item.itunes:author: Levi and Amy
item.itunes:subtitle: After essentially a one year hiatus, we're back! Janey joins us as a special guest, we catch up on a year of pandemic life in a matter of minutes, talk about The Mandalorian sort of, and play a game of "mimic" where we all try to mimic random sounds. Thi...
item.itunes:summary: After essentially a one year hiatus, we're back! Janey joins us as a special guest, we catch up on a year of pandemic life in a matter of minutes, talk about The Mandalorian sort of, and play a game of "mimic" where we all try to mimic random sounds. This episode was recorded in mid-Feb 2021. Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun
item.description: After essentially a one year hiatus, we're back! Janey joins us as a special guest, we catch up on a year of pandemic life in a matter of minutes, talk about The Mandalorian sort of, and play a game of "mimic" where we all try to mimic random sounds. This episode was recorded in mid-Feb 2021. Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun
item.content:encoded: After essentially a one year hiatus, we're back! Janey joins us as a special guest, we catch up on a year of pandemic life in a matter of minutes, talk about The Mandalorian sort of, and play a game of "mimic" where we all try to mimic random sounds. This episode was recorded in mid-Feb 2021. Comments or questions? twitter.com/weusedtobefun
